```{r}
library(tidyverse)

data("ChickWeight")
head(ChickWeight)

total_chickens <- ChickWeight %>% summarise(n = n_distinct(Chick))
total_chickens

# Summary Exercises

# 1) Average weight on Day 18 (any diet)
avg_day18 <- ChickWeight %>%
  filter(Time == 18) %>%
  summarise(avg_weight = mean(weight))
avg_day18

# 2) Total number of chickens per diet
chicks_per_diet <- ChickWeight %>%
  group_by(Diet) %>%
  summarise(total_chicks = n_distinct(Chick), .groups = "drop")
chicks_per_diet

# 3) Standard deviation of weights on Day 0 and Day 21
sd_day0  <- ChickWeight %>% filter(Time == 0)  %>% summarise(std_dev = sd(weight))
sd_day21 <- ChickWeight %>% filter(Time == 21) %>% summarise(std_dev = sd(weight))
sd_day0; sd_day21

# 4) For Day 21, mean and SD grouped by Diet (labels: mean_weight, std_dev)
day21_by_diet <- ChickWeight %>%
  filter(Time == 21) %>%
  group_by(Diet) %>%
  summarise(mean_weight = mean(weight),
            std_dev     = sd(weight),
            .groups = "drop")
day21_by_diet

# Visualization Exercises

# 1) Filter weights on Day 14 for Diet 3; save as wt_day14_diet3
wt_day14_diet3 <- ChickWeight %>%
  filter(Time == 14, Diet == 3)

# Dot plot (Counts of points binned along x)
ggplot(wt_day14_diet3, aes(x = weight)) +
  geom_dotplot(binwidth = 10) +
  labs(title = "Weights of Chickens on Diet 3, on Day 14",
       x = "Weight (grams)",
       y = "Count")

# 2) Histogram of chicken weights on Day 0, any diet
ggplot(ChickWeight %>% filter(Time == 0), aes(x = weight)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1, fill = "skyblue", color = "black") +
  labs(title = "Chicken Weights on Day 0",
       x = "Weight (grams)",
       y = "Number of Chickens")

# 3) Boxplots of Day 21 weights grouped by Diet
ggplot(ChickWeight %>% filter(Time == 21),
       aes(x = factor(Diet, levels = c("1","2","3","4")),
           y = weight,
           fill = factor(Diet))) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("pink", "green", "skyblue", "purple"),
                    labels = c("Diet 1", "Diet 2", "Diet 3", "Diet 4"),
                    name = "Diet") +
  labs(title = "Comparison of Chicken Diets",
       x = "Diet",
       y = "Weight (grams)")
```
